name: Hotdog Simulator
description:
This a simple Clicker Game about Hotdogs. In this Clicker Game I added Acheivments, Leaderboards, Costumes and a Costume Pack.  This is my first Game published on Itch.io, and I am happy about it.

The art for each achievment and names for each acheivment is funny and makes sense.. hopefully. The music was made by  David Renda on the Royalty Free 8-Bit Background Music Downloads website. Heres the link:  https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/8-bit-music/6  They provide great 8 bit music.

By the way, This game took a little bit of inspiration by Cookie Clicker. I added the Hotdogs falling out of the sky and added 2 buildings (Download the game to know the buildings names!)

Thats it for Hotdog Simulator

My next game is coming soon so stay tuned!

Have a Great time!
